code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useTeams}from'./../context/TeamsContext';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./css/Teams.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Teams=()=>{const{teams,loading}=useTeams();const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('international');const navigate=useNavigate();const internationalTeams=teams.filter(t=>t.national_team);const domesticTeams=teams.filter(t=>!t.national_team);const renderTeamCard=team=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-card",onClick:()=>navigate("/teams/".concat(team.id,"/matches"),{state:{teamName:team.name}}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:team.image_path,alt:team.name,onError:e=>{e.target.src='https://em-content.zobj.net/source/apple/354/white-flag_1f3f3-fe0f.png';}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:team.name})]},team.id);const renderTabContent=()=>{const relevantTeams=activeTab==='international'?internationalTeams:domesticTeams;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"teams-grid",children:relevantTeams.map(renderTeamCard)});};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"teams-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83C\uDFCF Cricket Teams"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tabs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeTab==='international'?'active':'',onClick:()=>setActiveTab('international'),children:"\uD83C\uDF0D International Teams"}),domesticTeams.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeTab==='domestic'?'active':'',onClick:()=>setActiveTab('domestic'),children:"\uD83C\uDFE0 Domestic & Franchise Teams"})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading teams..."}):renderTabContent()]});};export default Teams;
